meanings.definition: Having the same number of calories.
meanings.sent1: The equicaloric snacks had identical calorie counts.
meanings.sent2: The equicaloric meals were perfect for comparing nutritional values.
meanings.sent3: The equicaloric cookies were so evenly matched, it was hard to pick a favorite.
meanings.sent4: Her equicaloric portions were like balanced scales, ensuring fairness in her diet.
meanings.sent5: The equicaloric drinks were like mirror images, reflecting perfect calorie balance.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a diet in which the caloric intake remains constant.
meanings.sent1: She followed an equicaloric diet to maintain her weight.
meanings.sent2: The equicaloric plan helped him stay consistent with his calorie intake.
meanings.sent3: His equicaloric routine made him the envy of his friends who struggled with diets.
meanings.sent4: The equicaloric approach was like a steady ship in the stormy sea of fad diets.
meanings.sent5: Her equicaloric strategy was a reliable compass guiding her through the world of nutrition.
